reference: Arrow, K.J., 1971 Theory of risk bearing , Markham, New York. Bhagwati, Jagdish, N., 1965 On the equivalence of tariffs and quotas in R.E. Baldwin et al., eds., Trade, growth and the balance of payments (Rand McNally Chicago).

Bhagwati, Jagdish N. 1976, Anatomy and consequences of exchange control regimes (Ballinger Pub. Company, Cambridge, Mass.). Bhagwati, Jagdish N., 1968, More on the equivalence of tariffs and quotas, American Economic Review 58, 142-146.

Caves, Richard E., 1974, International trade, international investment, and imperfect markets, Special Papers in International Economics, no. 10, Princeton N.J.: International Finance Section, Princeton University.
Corden, W. Max, 1971, The theory of protection (Oxford University Press).
Corden W. Max, 1974, Trade policy and economic welfare (Claredon Press, Oxford).
Fishelson, Gideon and Frank Flatters, 1975, The non-equivalence of tariffs and quotas under uncertainty, Journal of International Economics 5, 385-393.
Fishelson, Gideon and A. Hillman, 1979, Domestic monopoly and redundant tariff protection, Journal of International Economics, 47-55.
Helpman, E. and A. Razin, 1980, Efficient protection under uncertainty, American Economic Review, 716-731.
Sandmo , Agnar, 1971, On the theory of the firm under price uncertainty, American Economic Review, 65-73.
Shibata, H., 1968, A note on the equivalence of the tariffs and quotas, American Economic Review, 58, 137-142.
